DogLines: Every day is the best day with you!
Do you like food? I like food!
I love watching you water plants!
Who are you gonna see today?
I didn't chew the rug, promise!
B O R K b o r k B O R K
I wanna chase the chickens today..
I'd herd cattle but cows spook me!
I didn't empty the fridge, promise!
CatLines: I will shed fur where I please!
I want you to pet me, but only when I want.
